mapper.select: select sssrib.*,sssb.BROADCAST_NAME as broadcastName,sssb.BROADCAST_GPS_BAI_DU broadcastGpsBaiDu,sssb.BROADCAST_GPS as broadcastGps ,sssbe.BROADCAST_CONTENT broadcastContent ,sssbe.MEDIA_RESOURCE_URL mediaResourceUrl from sys_scenic_spot_route_in_broadcast sssrib left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_BROADCAST sssb on sssrib.sys_scenic_spot_broadcast_id = sssb.BROADCAST_ID left join SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_BROADCAST_EXTEND sssbe on sssrib.sys_scenic_spot_broadcast_id = sssbe.BROADCAST_ID order by sssrib.sort desc
